title: When you get ulted by Sona

replies.body: i love seeing Sion charge at me and i simply side step and say in all chat "ole!"
Worst feeling is playing Sion into Anivia in ARAM

> [{quoted}](name=Alzon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Q6oZUHUN,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-02-27T20:06:21.107+0000)
>
> Worst feeling is playing Sion into Anivia in ARAM

No, the worst is playing Nunu vs Anivia in Aram xD So many missed snowballs, so so many laughs as Anivia...

> [{quoted}](name=Sugarlicious,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Q6oZUHUN,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-02-27T23:20:24.373+0000)
>
> No, the worst is playing Nunu vs Anivia in Aram xD So many missed snowballs, so so many laughs as Anivia...

Had one I was {{champion:30}} at the height of his recent power.... Enemy team was:
{{champion:203}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:8}}  {{champion:35}} {{champion:16}} ..........

Never even had a dark harvest proc off ult.....
This was actually my favorite moment in the series when I was younger, haha. I don't know to this day why I laughed so hard.

This was one of the best in the series to be sure. For me, my favorite was probably boneless Peter. For some reason that cracked me up so hard, and I still laugh whenever I see it.

https://i.imgur.com/zbmM5dZ.gif[/img]

What is that, eight frames a second?

EDIT: 7.69, apparently.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Q6oZUHUN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-27T19:02:22.989+0000)
>
> What is that, eight frames a second?
> 
> EDIT: 7.69, apparently.

That's all the frames you need

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Q6oZUHUN,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-02-27T19:21:37.380+0000)
>
> That's all the frames you need
